participant_1.background:
I work a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.
I have a cat named Mick Jagger, and he's my best friend.
i like to read books about chinese history.
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.

participant_2.background:
I recently got to share my love of sports with a larger audience.
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
I do not own a home, but I do enjoy traveling and sharing my experiences with the world.
i read tons of books.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
Hi there, I enjoy watching romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read books about Chinese history, and I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
That's cool, I love to read tons of books too! What's your favorite book you've read recently?
My favorite book I've read recently is called "The Poppy War." It's a fantasy novel set in a world inspired by Chinese history.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check it out. I recently got to share my love of sports with a larger audience.
That's awesome! I'm not really a sports person, but I can appreciate how much passion people have for their favorite teams.
Yeah, it's really fun to be able to talk to other people about something you're passionate about.
I agree. It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
Exactly! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my cat, Mick Jagger. He's my best friend.
That's so cute! I love cats. I have one named Mittens.
Aww, I love that name! Cats are the best
